FuncDef: This command creates a new split horizon group for the VPLS instance. Traffic arriving on a SAP or spoke SDP within this split horizon group is not copied to other SAPs or spoke SDPs in the same split horizon group.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the split horizon group to which the SDP belongs.
